channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2025041730
item.description:
Report X-2025041730

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-24T01:00:23+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-26
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED DUE TO GETTING WET FROM RAINWATER. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED TWO INNER BOXES MARKED NONSPILLABLE RECHARGEABLE SLA BATTERY CONTAINING BELUCE RECHARGEABLE SEALED LEAD-ACID BATTERIES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. NONSPILLABLE BATTERY IS NOT ON THE OUTER BOX.
